item.title: Need help with somethings
item.dc:creator: @Nemesis1 Nemesis-
item.description:
@Nemesis1 wrote:

[quote=“yong min, post:5, topic:348387”]RSCD uses groupID, instead of rank.

owner.groupID = 4;

Learn about using db.updateQuery…

public void setPlayerMute(Player p) { try { db = new DBConnection(); db.updateQuery("UPDATE `rscd_players` SET `mute`=" + 1 + " WHERE `user`=" + p.getUsernameHash()); db.close(); } catch (SQLException ex) { System.out.println("An error occured while trying to mute a player."); System.err.println(ex); } } [/quote]
why not just change variable in player class and save it on logout…the way you did it is bad.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with somethings
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

RSCD uses groupID, instead of rank.

owner.groupID = 4;

Learn about using db.updateQuery…

	public void setPlayerMute(Player p) {
		try {
			db = new DBConnection();
			db.updateQuery("UPDATE `rscd_players` SET `mute`=" + 1 + " WHERE `user`=" + p.getUsernameHash());
			db.close();
		} catch (SQLException ex) {
			System.out.println("An error occured while trying to mute a player.");
			System.err.println(ex);
		}
	}

item.title: Need help with somethings
item.dc:creator: @Pandemicpk Pandemicpk
item.description:
@Pandemicpk wrote:

hey guys

  1. i recently added a sub card to my server im coding and im having problems with one minor thing

the problem is that i followed yongs noobscape guide on adding it, im using a rscd v25 based server.

the error is owner.rank = 1; i need a different method for doing this, anyone know the fix?

  1. i need helping fixing my stuck command so that you cannot use it while in jail. i have this part of the code in my command
    but it still allows people to use it even though they are in jail.

if(player.getLocation().inModRoom()) { player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You can't use this command in the modroom!"); return; }

  1. i need a guide on adding a ip ban, un ipban, ban, unban, mute, unmute system to a rscd v25 source

thanks guys
